data.text: Mu ngeyo, a Yave, ndisuamina
Wukhudi ayi wuphukisa mu busonga buaku
Ba ditadi diama diodi di kutsuekanga ;
Wukhudi Nzambi ama mu mioko mi batu bambimbi ;
Bila ngeyo wuba diana diama, a Yave,
Tona ndibutuka, mu ngeyo ndieti singimina ;
Ndieka banga diambu di siminina kuidi bawombo,
Munu ama widi wuwala mu nzitusu aku
Kadi kundoza mu thangu ndieka nunu ;
Bila bambeni ziama zilembo thubidila
balembo tubi : “Nzambi wunyekudi,
Kadi ba thama ayi minu, a Nzambi,
Bika mimfundi miama mibungana mu tsoni ;
Vayi kuidi minu, ndiela tulanga kaka diana mu zithangu zioso
Munu ama wela yolukila busonga buaku
Ndiela kuiza ayi yamikisa mavanga maku ma lulendo ;
Tona mu bumuana buama, a Nzambi, ngeyo wundonga
Bobuawu, bu ndiela nuna ayi zitsuki ziphembi
Busonga buaku buntula nate ku diyilu, a Nzambi.
Ngeyo wumbonisa ziphasi ziwombo ayi zindudi ;
Wela buela wokisa nzitusu ama,
Ndiela kuzitisa mu ngitala
Bididi biama biela yimbila mu diambu di khini
Ludimi luama luela yolukila mavanga maku masonga
